mapper.select: select realname as targetName from sys_user where id in( SELECT REGEXP_SUBSTR ( #{target}, '[^,]+', 1,rownum) from dual connect by rownum <= LENGTH (#{target}) - LENGTH (regexp_replace(#{target}, ',', ''))+1 )
